EmailTemplate.description: Welcome email for Online Store Customers that come through DDMN Web Apps with Vision Products
EmailTemplate.name: Online Store Customer Welcome MN Vision
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for purchasing {!Contact.Product_Purchased__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We're excited to welcome you to Delta Dental of Minnesota!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We're excited to welcome you to Delta Dental of Minnesota and DeltaVision®!
You have made a great choice in dental and vision coverage. Attached are your certificates of coverage* for your records.
Delta Dental Member Portal
Access your benefits information 24/7
Find a Provider View Coverage View Claims Sign up for an electronic Explanation of Benefits
Payment: Payments are typically collected on the 5th of every month.
ID Cards: ID cards can be downloaded and printed from the Member Portal.
DeltaVision® Member Portal
Access your benefits information 24/7
Find an eye doctor View Coverage View Claims Know Before You Go (KBYG) for cost estimates prior to your eye appointment and more
Payment: Payments are typically collected on the 5th of every month.
ID Cards: ID cards can be downloaded and printed from the Member Portal.
The Power of Smile™!
Your benefits include a FREE subscription to The Power of Smile™ blog. Learn about current topics and trends in dentistry and the importance of oral health as it relates to overall health from our team of experts.
Visit https//www.DeltaDentalMN.org/blog-sign-up to sign up and access over 100 articles on the importance of oral health from infants to adults.
Thank you for choosing Delta Dental of Minnesota and allowing us to help protect your smile and your eyes!
Sincerely,
Delta Dental of Minnesota
Please do not reply to this email. This email is sent from a mailbox that does not accept replies
*Certificate of coverage: A policy you receive from Delta Dental that explains your benefit coverage in detail
